00005 namespace {
00006   int const WGS_84 = 23;
00007 
00008   void geo_to_utm(double lat, double lon, double &north, double &east) {
00009     char zone[4];
00010     LLtoUTM(WGS_84, lat, lon, north, east, zone);
00011   }
00012 
00013   void utm_to_geo(double north, double east, double &lat,  double &lon) {
00014     const char* Zone = "10";
00015     const int NORTHERN_HEMISPHERE_BUFFER = 10000000;
00016     UTMtoLL(WGS_84, 
00017            north + NORTHERN_HEMISPHERE_BUFFER, east, 
00018            Zone, lat, lon);
00019     if(east == 0.0)
00020       lon = -126.0;
00021   }
00022 
00023   bool intersect(EUROPA::Domain& dom, 
00024                double lb, double ub, double precision_error){
00025 
00026     double _lb = (lb > dom.getUpperBound() ? lb - precision_error : lb);
00027     double _ub = (ub < dom.getLowerBound() ? ub + precision_error : ub);
00028 
00029     return dom.intersect(_lb, _ub);
00030   }
00031

00037     }

00046 GeoUTMConstraint::GeoUTMConstraint(EUROPA::LabelStr const &name,
00047                                EUROPA::LabelStr const &propagator,
00048                                EUROPA::ConstraintEngineId const &cstrEngine,
00049                                std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars)
00050   :EUROPA::Constraint(name, propagator, cstrEngine, vars),
00051    m_lat(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[GeoUTMConstraint::LAT])),
00052    m_lon(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[GeoUTMConstraint::LON])),
00053    m_northing(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[GeoUTMConstraint::NORTH])),
00054    m_easting(getCurrentDomain(m_variables[GeoUTMConstraint::EAST])) {
00055   // assert ?
00056 }
00057 
00058 void GeoUTMConstraint::handleExecute() {
00059   static EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const UTM_10(-126.0, -120.0001);
00060   // Lat lon precision is set to 0.018 seconds of a degree ~= 0.000005
00061   // this correspond roughly on 50cm precision in UTM
00062   static double const ll_precision = 0.00001;
00063   static double const utm_precision = 0.5;
00064 
00065   double lat, lon, north, east;
00066 
00067   // ensure that longitude reflects UTM 10 zone
00068   m_lon.intersect(UTM_10);
00069 
00070   if( m_lat.isSingleton() && m_lon.isSingleton() ) {
00071     /* convert fixed (lat,lon) into UTM */
00072     lat = EUROPA::cast_double(m_lat.getSingletonValue());
00073     lon = EUROPA::cast_double(m_lon.getSingletonValue());
00074         
00075     geo_to_utm(lat, lon, north, east);
00076     if( intersect(m_northing, north, north, utm_precision) &&
00077        m_northing.isEmpty() )
00078       return;
00079     if( intersect(m_easting, east, east, utm_precision) &&
00080        m_easting.isEmpty() )
00081       return;
00082   } else if( m_northing.isSingleton() && m_easting.isSingleton() ) {
00083     /* convert fixed UTM into (lat,lon) */
00084     north = EUROPA::cast_double(m_northing.getSingletonValue());
00085     east = EUROPA::cast_double(m_easting.getSingletonValue());
00086     utm_to_geo(north, east, lat, lon);
00087     
00088     if( intersect(m_lat, lat, lat, ll_precision) &&
00089        m_lat.isEmpty() )
00090       return;
00091     if( intersect(m_lon, lon, lon, ll_precision) &&
00092        m_lon.isEmpty() )
00093       return;
00094  } 
00095 }
